messages.subject: Hello all. Intro and question
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/03 3:31:17 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  Because
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/03 3:31:17 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Hi Sheila, I am in Washington state. Why? >>

Because every state has different laws. We can't give you advice about
documentation if we don't know your laws.
It varies a lot from state to state. In some, you don't have to do anything.

Ren
"They dined on mince, and slices of quince, Which they ate with a runcible
spoon;
And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, they danced by the light of the
moon."
--The Owl and the Pussycat
Edward Lear
